description: Nueva Germania was founded in the late 1800s by German immigrants looking to start an Aryan colony in Paraguay. It failed, but remnants of German culture remain.
title: Finding Traces of a Failed Aryan Colony
title_page: Finding Traces of a Failed Aryan Colony - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Nueva Germania was founded in the late 1800s by German immigrants looking to start an Aryan colony in Paraguay. It failed, but remnants of German culture remain.
